This is weird. There is a completely empty patch of space in the middle of the field...
Something feels off, but I can't put my finger on it.
This empty space again, taunting me...
I'm picking up a distress signal from this area! I must investigate!
We c..me here to ..est these new drones. They we..e said t.. be fai..proof.
They se..med to work. But th..n... They turn..d on us.
We don'.. know f..om w...re. But they came. An.. th... de...r..yed us. We h.... n.. ch...
I've already read this. I know how it ends...
The rest of this log is too corrupted to read. I wonder if those droids are still around...
These logs suggest this ship was part of a larger mission...
I am picking up a distress signal! I wonder if there might still be survivors...
No signs of life... This signal must have been sent long ago...
These are the logs of the Research Vessel the ESA-Smastirini. Our mission was simple: test some drones, return home to Earth.
At first, all seemed well. But when we disengaged our FTL engines, we knew we were in the wrong place. Something.. something had altered our path.
We began to fear... but nothing seemed out of the ordinary. We started testing our drones... and then it all went wrong.
On day 3, the first ship dissapeared. One second it was there, the next it was gone. Someone gave Them a name... the nameless force opposing us.
On day 8, we had harvested enough Exotic Matter for the FTL jump back. But when we engaed the engines, nothing happened. And then all went to hell.
The drones turned on us. They destroyed us. Some of our ships may have been able to get away, but I find that possibility unlikely...
I can hear them coming now... Goodbye... I hope this log serves as warning to any who may come after...
These people have been long dead... so who sent the signal?
It was a trap! The signal was a fake! I must get out of here!
It seems this ship specialized in drones. Most of the data is corrupted but I can still extract the plans for a [item=utility_droid]!
I was able to loot a jumpship from the debris.
I was able to extract the plans for the pirate's ships! I should be able to make my own now!
There isn't much here, but there were plans for a [item=stun_missile] here!
I see you found an [color=770000]Asteroid Field[/color]! I have checked your ship's scanners and they are picking up activity in the area.
I have reason to suspect it is pirates. Let me just run some tests... [pause=1]Aha! I have locked onto a signal from the pirates' base!
If you can go and eradicate them, I might be able to make something out of their tech!
I have killed the pirates the [object=mechanic] asked for... I'll call her on the [item=com_device].
Cass? I killed the pirates you asked.
Great! Can you search their base for some [item=advanced_tech]?
Here's the tech you wanted.
Awesome! I can make so much new tech with this! Go check out the new recipies in the [color=770000]Advanced Lab[/color]!
Hey! Get out of there!
Hello there traveler! Could you spare some time to help us?
The pirates in the vicinity keep attacking our operations. We require some materials to repair our defense systems.
If you could obtain some of the pirate's tech... we might be able to fight them off.
Amazing! I will use this to craft some new tech in our [color=770000]Lab[/color]! Feel free to use our facilities as you please!
We have been developing a new laser beam, but it requires large amounts of [item=magnegem]s to complete. Could you get some?
This is exactly what we need! Feel free to craft a [item=fighter.mine] in the [color=770000]Lab[/color]!
Thank you for all your help, traveller! Feel free to borrow any resources you need!
The pirates must have destroyed this base... I'll see what I can salvage from the poor miners...
You can call us on your [item=com_device] to find your way back here if needed.
Greetings traveler! I am transmitting our location now...
Location transmitted! We await your return!
